title: Site Search 360
shortDescription: Add a powerful search bar to your site.
longDescription:
Site Search 360 is an easy-to-integrate but powerful search bar for your website.

1-minute product overview: https://youtu.be/yZoYy-JBIh8

Site Search 360 features:

*Site-wide content indexing with an option to include multiple domains and sub-domains
*The types of content we can index and make searchable:
- HTML pages
- JS-rendered content
- FAQs
- full-text document indexing: PDF, DOC, XLS, PPT
- YouTube videos
- Password-protected page crawling

*Full control over your search and indexing settings

*Built-in result manager: re-order and pin the best results, re-write, re-direct, create custom banners

*Result groups, facets, and filters

*Popular and recent search suggestions

*Full dictionary support in 19 languages

*Unlimited custom synonyms and enrichments

*Internal search insights and external tracking with Google Analytics and Google Tag Manager

*Highly customizable look and feel via custom CSS, API, or our interactive Search Designer:
https://www.sitesearch360.com/search-designer/

To manage your crawler settings, use the credentials sent to you by email to log in to your control panel:
https://control.sitesearch360.com/login
instructions:
Add the Site Search 360 search bar by dragging and dropping it to your site template.

You can also check our getting-started guide: https://www.sitesearch360.com/getting-started/ or reach out to us at cf-support@sitesearch360.com and we'll help you get up and running!
author: Site Search 360

products.title: FREE
products.shortDescription: For smaller, low traffic sites.
products.longDescription:
* 150 pages indexed
* 1,000 queries a month
* One monthly recrawl
* Sitemap support
* Full dictionary support
* Complete result control
* Site Search 360 branding

products.title: Columbo
products.shortDescription: Fresher indices, PDF indexing, less branding, semantic search
products.longDescription:
* 1,500 pages indexed
* 5,000 queries a month
* Weekly recrawls
* PDF indexing (5 pages / PDF)
* Sitemap support
* Semantic search
* Full dictionary support
* Complete result control
* Site Search 360 branding only on result pages

products.title: Holmes
products.shortDescription: API Access, no branding
products.longDescription:
* 3,000 pages indexed
* 10,000 queries a month
* Weekly recrawls
* PDF indexing (10 pages / PDF)
* E-Mail Support
* Sitemap support
* Semantic search
* Full dictionary support
* Complete result control
* API Access
* No Site Search 360 branding

products.title: Batman
products.shortDescription: All the good stuff + help from our team whenever you need it.
products.longDescription:
* 15,000 pages indexed
* 25,000 queries a month
* Two weekly recrawls
* PDF indexing (50 pages / PDF)
* Priority Support
* Sitemap support
* Semantic search
* Full dictionary support
* Complete result control
* API Access
* No Site Search 360 branding

proposedApp.title: Site Search 360
proposedApp.shortDescription: Add a search bar to your site.
proposedApp.longDescription:
Site Search 360 is an easy to integrate but powerful search bar for your website.

Features of Site Search 360 include:

* Autocomplete and search suggestions
* Extremely fast and mobile ready
* Full result control (redirect, rewrite, manual reordering)
* Fully customizable + content grouping
* Semantics support: The indexer will automatically try to understand what the content is about so you don’t have to manually create tons of synonyms (though you still can)
* Analytics about user behavior (did they search or click a suggestion, how long did that take, etc.)
* Search trend monitoring (what are your users searching for)
* Ability to export all collected data, integrates also with Google Analytics and Google Tag Manager
* Import of Google Custom Search campaigns
* Support for 19 languages
proposedApp.author: Site Search 360

proposedApp.title: Site Search 360
proposedApp.shortDescription: Site Search 360 adds great search functionality to your site
proposedApp.longDescription:
Site Search 360 is an easy to integrate but powerful search bar for your website.

Features of Site Search 360 include:

* Autocomplete and Search Suggestions
* Extremely fast and mobile ready
* Full result control (redirect, rewrite, manual reordering)
* Fully customizable + content grouping
* Semantics support: The indexer will automatically try to understand what the content is about so you don’t have to manually create tons of synonyms (which you still can)
* Analytics about searches and behavior of users (did they search, or click a suggestion - how long did that take etc.). Also you can analyze search term trends and export all the data. Integrates also with Google Analytics and Google Tag Manager.
* Import of Google Custom Search campaigns
* Support for 18 languages

proposedApp.title: Site Search 360
proposedApp.shortDescription: Add a powerful search bar to your site.
proposedApp.longDescription:
Site Search 360 is an easy-to-integrate but powerful search bar for your website.

1-minute product overview: https://youtu.be/yZoYy-JBIh8

Site Search 360 features:

*Site-wide content indexing with an option to include multiple domains and sub-domains
*The types of content we can index and make searchable:
- HTML pages
- JS-rendered content
- FAQs
- full-text document indexing: PDF, DOC, XLS, PPT
- YouTube videos
- Password-protected page crawling

*Full control over your search and indexing settings

*Built-in result manager: re-order and pin the best results, re-write, re-direct, create custom banners

*Result groups, facets, and filters

*Popular and recent search suggestions

*Full dictionary support in 19 languages

*Unlimited custom synonyms and enrichments

*Internal search insights and external tracking with Google Analytics and Google Tag Manager

*Highly customizable look and feel via custom CSS, API, or our interactive Search Designer:
https://www.sitesearch360.com/search-designer/

To manage your crawler settings, use the credentials sent to you by email to log in to your control panel:
https://control.sitesearch360.com/login
proposedApp.instructions:
Add the Site Search 360 search bar by dragging and dropping it to your site template.

You can also check our getting-started guide: https://www.sitesearch360.com/getting-started/ or reach out to us at cf-support@sitesearch360.com and we'll help you get up and running!
proposedApp.author: Site Search 360
